text: John Apthorp (born 1935 died 9 July 2024) is a British businessman. He was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire during the 2014 New Year Honours. He is specialised in frozen food items and alcoholic drinks. From 1968 to 1974, he served as the councillor for Edgware, a town in north London. In 2008, he was awarded the "Freedom of the Borough of Barnet" title. He also served as the trustee of Milly Apthorp Charitable trust until its closure. Now, he runs another charitable organization named John Apthorp Charity. ==References== Category:British businesspeople Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire
title: John Apthorp
